item.title: A ban on feeding pigeons ruffles lots of feathers in Mumbai
item.description: The pigeon population has exploded — a result of people feeding the birds. For some it's a holy duty and a way to connect to nature. Critics point to health risks tied to exposure to pigeon droppings.
